name: Algorand
introduce: Algorand is a decentralized, scalable, and secure blockchain infrastructure.  It achieves transaction throughputs at the speed of traditional finance, but with immediate finality, near zero transaction costs, and on a 24/7 basis. From decentralized finance to generative NFT art (and everything in between), Algorand is powering economic models of the future. Algorand is designed by MIT professor and Turing Award winning cryptographer Silvio Micali.
